context: ðŸ§­ Deemind Ã— Salla â€” Complete Integration Blueprint
objective: Finalize and optimize Deemind core pipeline for full Salla compatibility and local independence

tasks.title: Establish core/contracts and canonical structure
tasks.notes: Seeded ThemeContract, API contract, build report schema, and directory scaffolding under core/.

tasks.title: Enhance parser with conflict-aware extraction aligned to contracts
tasks.notes: runHybridParser now persists canonical/core-aligned theme.json with sections/components/conflicts.

tasks.title: Implement semantic mapper & i18n pass
tasks.notes: Mapper now tracks placeholder/i18n/sanitize stats and writes them into canonical theme.json.

tasks.title: Build Twig dependency graph for includes/extends ordering
tasks.notes: New tools/twig-dependency-graph.js generates per-theme graph + validator reuse.

tasks.title: Implement Salla schema/filter/partial sync tooling
tasks.notes: tools/salla-sync.ts writes canonical snapshots + meta.json and is documented in README/docs.

tasks.title: Update docs/README/runbook to mirror Runtime 1.1
tasks.notes: New Deemind-Architecture, Salla-Integration-Plan, Friction-Reduction-Plan, and updated README/runbook.

tasks.title: AJV + runtime validator aligned with Salla schema
tasks.notes: CLI enforces ThemeContract + Salla schema via AJV; extended validator now reads synced filters/partials and writes results into canonical validated block.

tasks.title: Composable mock data layer + context builder
tasks.notes: Added core/mock datasets, mock:data/mock:context scripts, preview/runtime now read cache context.

tasks.title: Align runtime stub & store composer with contracts
tasks.notes: Ensure stub APIs, SSE, Twilight shim, and presets rely on composed data.

tasks.title: Service API typed boundaries + task runner queue
tasks.notes: Expose /api/run, job tracking, logs, and auth guards per contracts.

tasks.title: Dashboard orchestration for builds, runtime, scenarios, and diffs
tasks.notes: UI consumes shared types and manages stub, builds, reports, presets.

tasks.title: Central logger + SSE stream + structured reports
tasks.notes: One JSONL log, SSE feed, reports stored under /reports.

tasks.title: Unit + integration + scenario test harness
tasks.notes: Added mock-layer test harness (npm run test:mock) and documented CLI testing commands.

tasks.title: Package outputs + manifest + optional installer
tasks.notes: Build manifest, ZIP outputs, and final deliverable pipeline.
